Features.name: Simple
Features.text: Our content is in your own dialect so you can learn what you need without any language barriers and is built using interactive graphics and animations that act as a visual aid for your learning.

Features.name: Accurate
Features.text: For each subject we support, we follow the American teaching model, which focuses on understanding the underlying concept and application by solving real-life themed problems instead of memorization. Also, every video or handout we create is verified by experienced faculty in the respective field.

Features.name: Free
Features.text: Our content is free and accessible by anyone regardless of their location, background, or financial situation.

Problem.title: Complexity
Problem.text: People do not enjoy STEM because they find it abstract and hard to grasp

Problem.title: Methodology
Problem.text: Tutoring tends to follow a memorization approach rather than application through real-life problems

Problem.title: Cost
Problem.text: People resort to tutoring sessions to grasp the materials which tends to be expensive
